dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new information analytically, breaking it down into components and examining each part thoroughly.
Your FarTwin will approach new information intuitively, relying on instinct and personal experience to guide their understanding.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves rationally, using logic and reason to guide their creative decisions.
Your FarTwin will express themselves emotionally, letting their feelings and intuition guide their artistic choices.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others socially?

options.description: Your FarTwin will interact with others in an outgoing manner, seeking out new social connections and experiences.
Your FarTwin will interact with others in a more reserved manner, preferring one-on-one conversations and small group settings.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will make decisions based on their own expertise and judgment, trusting themselves to make the right choice.
Your FarTwin will make decisions by considering input from others and weighing multiple perspectives before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach time management in a relaxed manner, prioritizing flexibility and adaptability over strict schedules.
Your FarTwin will approach time management in a structured manner, planning out their day with precision and attention to detail.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems logically, breaking them down into components and analyzing each part to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will approach problems intuitively, relying on instinct and personal experience to guide their creative solutions.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be willing to take risks and push boundaries, seeking out new challenges and experiences.
Your FarTwin will approach risk with caution, preferring to analyze situations carefully before making a decision.
